content.text:
# List of Cleveland Crusaders players

This is a list of players who played at least one game for the Cleveland Crusaders of the World Hockey Association from 1972–73 to 1975–76.
__NOTOC__
A
Ray Adduono,
Ron Anderson,
Paul Andrea
B
Blake Ball,
Terry Ball,
Paul Baxter,
Brian Bowles,
Doug Brindley,
Ron Buchanan,
Brad Buetow

Ray Clearwater,
Wayne Connelly,
Mike Conroy,
Norm Cournoyer
D
Bob Dillabough
E

Grant Erickson,
Bill Evo
G
Danny Gruen
H
John Hanna,
Jocelyn Hardy,
